scripts.refresh: rm -rf ./node_modules/react-native-sortable-listview;cd ..;find . -name .git -prune -o -name node_modules -prune -o -name Sortable -prune -o -type d -exec mkdir -p ./Sortable/node_modules/react-native-sortable-listview/{} \; -o -exec cp {} ./Sortable/node_modules/react-native-sortable-listview/{} \; ;cd Sortable;node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js start
scripts.refresh-win: rimraf ./node_modules/react-native-sortable-listview;cd ..;find . -name .git -prune -o -name node_modules -prune -o -name Sortable -prune -o -type d -exec mkdir -p ./Sortable/node_modules/react-native-sortable-listview/{} \; -o -exec cp {} ./Sortable/node_modules/react-native-sortable-listview/{} \; ;cd Sortable;node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js start
